member.name: T:FCartographer.Form1
member.summary: Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 controls the elevation brush settings
Class: Form1 Used to interface with windows forms, holds program data.
Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 is used for the bar at the top of the form, handling File, Edit, View, etc.
Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 is used for Layer control
Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 is used for navigating the canvas; zoom, scroll, etc.
Partial Class: Form1 This part of Form1 controls the visibility of the panels
